== Funding Organizations ==


{{ #widget : BarChart
  | input = 'Funder'
  | output = {{ 'sumGrants' }}
  | query = 'SELECT ?Funder (SUM(<http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#integer>(?Grant)) AS ?sumGrants) WHERE {
      ?Project research:funder ?Funder .
      ?Project research:grant ?Grant . }
    GROUP BY ?Funder'
  | type = 'BAR_HORIZONTAL'
}}
